verbose_text: For analysis of soluble Pap1 levels, protein was extracted as described previously using a nondenaturing procedure in lysis buffer (50 mM Tris-HCl [pH 7.5], 150 mM NaCl, 0.5 g/100 ml Nonidet P-40 with 2 mug/ml pepstatin A, 2 mug/ml leupeptin, 100 mg/ml phenylmethylsulfonyl fluoride, and 1 ml/100 ml aprotinin), and extracts were clarified.
